Title: The Civility Zone
Plot: Gil John finally breaks through to daughter Cee, then gets a lesson in civility from the women's caucus. Andy heads to Miami to try and win back Adriana, and gets some insights into his "condition" from a therapist. Meanwhile, Robert ignores his advisors and helps register black voters.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Brooke Bloom, Ben Rameaka, Bob Balaban, Penn Jillette, Amy Sedaris, Wanda Sykes, Julie White, Todd Susman, Lee Wilkof, Natalie Gold, Lucy DeVito, Lila Newman, Tony Plana, Abigail Marlowe, Christine R
